local_intent: Perceive white_plate, prepare gripper and compute top grasp (grasp_white), approach and execute Pick with up to 2 attempts, verify grasp stability, then retreat to safe pose.
assumptions: white_plate is visible or will be detected by DetectObject
ComputeGraspPose will produce a usable grasp stored as grasp_white
Gripper can open to the specified width before grasping
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: perception (DetectObject) -> prepare (OpenGripper, ComputeGraspPose) -> approach (ApproachAndAlign) -> act (Pick with retries) -> verify (IsGraspStable) -> retreat.
